long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "MultiHighlight" Chrome Extension is a robust and intuitive tool designed to enhance your web browsing experience by enabling you to highlight specific words or phrases on any web page. Ideal for research, reading long articles, or casual browsing, this extension makes it easier to locate and emphasize important text, boosting your productivity and efficiency.

Key Features:
- Customizable Word Highlighting: Users can input multiple words or phrases, separated by a chosen delimiter, to be highlighted across the active web page.

- Color Customization: Personalize the appearance of your highlights by selecting your preferred color using an integrated color picker.

- Dynamic Color Shades: The extension automatically generates varying shades of the selected color for each highlighted word, ensuring clear visual distinction between different highlights.

- Advanced Text Styling: Apply bold, italic, and underline styles to your highlights, allowing for further customization and emphasis.

- Adjustable Opacity: Control the transparency of highlighted text using a simple slider, enabling a more subtle or prominent visual effect as needed.

- Real-Time Text Matching: Advanced regular expressions accurately detect and highlight words, even when they appear multiple times on the page, all in real-time as you type.

- Global Highlighting Across Tabs: Keep your highlights consistent across multiple tabs with the global highlighting feature, ensuring you never miss an important word.

- Seamless Integration: The extension works effortlessly with any webpage without requiring reloads or causing disruptions to your browsing experience.

- Persistent Highlighting: Your input is saved even after closing the extension, allowing for consistent highlighting without needing to re-enter words.

- Keyboard Shortcut Setup: Set up a custom keyboard shortcut to quickly open the extension, enhancing accessibility and convenience.

- Real-Time Updates: As you type, the extension dynamically highlights or removes words without the need to press enter or click a button.
